1.name: Soy
1.effect: Used as a hypoallergenic source of protein & carbs
1.details: Cats can develop allergies to it later in life

2.name: Corn
2.effect: Used as a source of carbs & fiber
2.details: Metabolizes into sugar in the gut

3.name: Wheat
3.effect: Used as a source of carbs
3.details: Common allergen for both dogs & cats

1.name: Tocopherols (mixed or non-mixed)
1.effect: A food preservative used to add Vitamin E to products
1.details: Your pet may be allergic since its derived sources (veggies, nuts or fish) are not listed on the label

2.name: L-ascorbyl-2-polyphosphate
2.details: There have been no controversies thus far.

3.name: Menadione sodium bisulfate comple
3.details: A known carcinogenic & also technically illegal since AAFCO only allows it to be used in Poultry feed

1.name: Butylated Hydroxyanisole (BHA)
1.details: Labelled as a carcinogen in California & banned in the EU

2.name: Butylated Hydroxytoluene (BHT)
2.details: Not concluded to be a carcinogen but still banned in Japan, Romania, Sweden & Australia

3.name: Ethoxyquin
3.details: Not concluded to be a carcinogen but still banned in the EU & Australia

1.name: Meat
1.effect: Clean muscle (skeletal, tongue, diaphragm, heart, esophagus) from animals
1.details: May or may not include fat, skin, nerves, & blood vessels

2.name: Meat meal
2.effect: Rendered (or processed) product from animal tissues
2.details: Excludes hair, hooves, horn, hide, manure, or GI contents

3.name: Meat and bone meal
3.effect: Rendered (or processed) product from animal tissues & bones
3.details: Excludes hair, hooves, horn, hide, manure, or GI contents

4.name: Meat by-product
4.effect: Rendered (or processed) product from animal tissues & bones
4.details: Excludes hair, hooves, horn, hide, manure, or GI contents

5.name: Meat digest
5.effect: Materials resulting from chemical or enzymatic degradation of clean animal tissue
5.details: Excludes hair, horns, teeth, hooves, & feathers

2.name: Poultry
2.details: This is 25-95% poultry. Ingredients named afterwards make up at least 3% each.

3.name: Poultry
3.details: This is 0% actual poultry. There may be stock or some other substitute used.

5.name: Beef/Deer
5.details: This is 25-95% beef/deer. Ingredients named afterwards make up at least 3% each.

6.name: Beef/Deer
6.details: This is 0% actual beef/deer. There may be stock or some other substitute used.

8.name: Fish/Seafood
8.details: This is 25-95% fish/seafood. Ingredients named afterwards make up at least 3% each.

9.name: Fish/Seafood
9.details: This is 0% actual fish/seafood. There may be stock or some other substitute used.

17.name: Veggie/Grain/Fruit
